<h3 id="X39831">X(39831) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: TRINH TO 7th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (SB+SC)*(4*S^4-((18*SA+SW)*R^2-4*SA^2+3*SB*SC)*S^2+(5*R^2-SW)*SA*SW^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39831) = 5*X(3)-X(13175) = 3*X(3)-X(39828) = 3*X(376)+X(39813) = 3*X(10606)+X(39820) = X(13175)+5*X(39812) = 2*X(13175)-5*X(39825) = 3*X(13175)-5*X(39828) = 2*X(39812)+X(39825) = 3*X(39812)+X(39828) = 3*X(39825)-2*X(39828)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(3)</p>
<p>X(39831) lies on these lines: {3,115}, {24,39809}, {30,39816}, {35,39815}, {36,39822}, {98,2071}, {99,1235}, {114,378}, {186,10723}, {376,39813}, {511,39819}, {542,12302}, {620,7526}, {671,37948}, {690,12901}, {1968,2967}, {2782,11250}, {2794,12084}, {3044,6241}, {3455,18859}, {5092,39811}, {5866,8781}, {5969,15578}, {6200,39823}, {6396,39824}, {6721,9818}, {7503,38748}, {7688,39821}, {9880,15078}, {10605,39810}, {10606,39820}, {10645,39829}, {10646,39830}, {10722,12086}, {10992,35477}, {11410,39803}, {11413,38749}, {11430,39805}, {11438,39806}, {11454,39807}, {11468,39808}, {12085,39857}, {13172,35473}, {13371,39847}, {13496,18570}, {14118,21166}, {14130,15561}, {14639,22467}, {17928,23514}, {18931,39804}, {19192,39814}, {19454,39826}, {19455,39827}, {20094,35494}, {21663,39817}, {22515,37814}, {39653,39832}</p>
<p>
X(39831) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 39812}, {12085, 39857}<br>
X(39831) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (39811, 5092), (39818, 39816), (39825, 3), (39847, 13371), (39860, 11250)<br>
</p>
